name: QTZ - GHOST IN THE SHELL II
description: Quartz Composer was a visual programming language, it was my tool for making and performing live visuals for many years, because it allows me to program live and its performance was very good. At some point in 2014 I started using it to create loops and upload them as gif to tumblr. * This piece was made in 2017 after seeing the live action movie.
